111231.content:
There was an old store down the street from your house. From what you can tell, the store doesn't get much business but manages to stay open. You decided to go there and see what's inside. The automatic door opens and you see a vast collection of what look like bodysuits for costumes. You're then approached by an employee of the store. She was quite old, possibly in her late 50s, with wrinkles and imperfections on her face.

"Can I help you?"

"Uh, yeah, what do you have in here?"

The old employee grinned "We have a vast selection of suits here, especially celebrities."

You think for a moment and ask if they have a Nicki Minaj suit. You've always been a fan of the bootylicious rapper and now you can get a costume.

"Certainly dear," the employee said as she shambled off down the aisles. She returned soon with a bag containing a skinsuit, a mask of Nicki and an outfit. "Try it on dear, see if it fits." She directs you to the changing rooms. No one else was present in the rooms, except for you. You close the door and read the instructions of the costume. The instructions say that to properly fit in the costume, you must strip down completely naked. You raise an eyebrow at this, but decide to undress anyway. Reading the instructions more, it claims that the mask must be put on first to properly fit. The mask was a full mask that had a set of long black flowing hair with some of the fabric on the neck area to mesh nicely with the suit. You put on the mask and grabbed the suit. The suit had extra padding on areas to make the costume look more like Nicki. You soon zipped up everything and looked into the mirror. You can see very well through the mask, like you weren't wearing one at all. It was somewhat strange thought, that this costume had nipples and a vagina sewn on, but you didn't mind that. You soon get out the outfit from the bag and try it on. The outfit consisted of black leggings, a yellow crop top t-shirt, black lingerie panties and black tennis shoes. After putting on the outfit, you turn to the mirror to admire yourself but, you couldn't help but to notice that the mask looks a lot tighter now then before. You take off the outfit and try to find the zipper, only to realize that the zipper is gone. Your jaw drops as you think that you broke the costume, until your eyes wander to the mirror and see that the mask's mouth is also open. You shut your mouth and open it again and realize that you're no longer wearing a mask. You're no longer wearing a Nicki Minaj costume, you ARE Nicki Minaj. You look down to your pelvis to see if your privates are still there.

11123112.content:
You decide to see if your friend, Jack, can help you with this predicament. You send him a text saying; "Ayo, need ur help w/ sumthn. Omw." You get into your car and drive over to his house. After a 6 minute drive, you pull up into his driveway and knock on the door. Jack opens it and gasps.

"Oh. My. God. Nicki Minaj! I..."

"Woah, woah woah, I'm not Nicki Minaj."

"Oh, um, are you a look alike? because I have a friend coming over..."

"No Jack, It's me, X*, and I need your help." Jack looks at you doubtfully.

"Really?" he says "Because my friend X, is not a celebrity, nor female."

"Would the real Nicki Minaj have this?" you say as you present your man meat. Jack thinks for a moment and then says,

"Right then, if you're really X, then answer me this; who's my favorite celebrity?"

"Huh, shit man it really is you. Please, come in, relax." You're finally let into Jack's house and you sit down on his couch. Jack comes by with two cans of Fountain Dew. He gives you one and starts drinking the other.

"So, how did this happen?"

"It's that costume shop down the road. I just wanted a Nicki Minaj costume, and now I'm stuck like this. I'm telling ya, that place is cursed."

"So, you were...transformed...by a costume from the shop?"

"Yeah, story of my life."

"Hmmm, I'll investigate this 'store' for my self later. In the meantime, you should go back home and get some R&R." You decide to heed your friend's advice and go back home. You still have other thoughts racing around your head like; How can I show up to work like this? How can I go incognito in public? What kind of job will I have to get? You decide that some TV should put your mind at ease.

A few days have passed and you're still at home, wondering what to do. Just then, you hear a knock at the door and you go to answer it. You open the door and see....

*author's note: X stands for whatever name you, the reader, desire.
